Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with caduceus symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '201'. Name Antimachos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0318.12.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (37)
